title: A Mate Like You
alternative_title: 運命の番がお前だなんて
status: 運命の番がお前だなんて
description:
Description :
        Shishikura yuu, watching his friends getting married, he also wanted to. So he applied for "Fate searching".... But to his suprised, he is fated with his longtime enemy,who is also his co-workers.Their fight for love but surrounded by fate string, will they be each other fated partner?
